# AUDIO::GET_RADIO_STATION_NAME

## Summary
Gets the name of the radio station with the specified index.  This serves as the text label.

## Parameters
* **INT** stationIndex

## Returns
* **STRING**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Converts radio station index to string. Use HUD::GET_FILENAME_FOR_AUDIO_CONVERSATION to get the user-readable text.
